professional_summary: Database Administrator with expertise in Oracle databases and OLTP systems, experienced in database maintenance, disaster recovery, and high-availability management.

key_responsibilities: Database maintenance and optimization for OLTP and Data Warehouse systems.
Implementation of disaster recovery and high-availability solutions using RAC and ASM.
Security management and compliance with database security policies.
Performance tuning and problem resolution using AWR and ADDM.
Implementation of partitioning techniques for large datasets.
Management of database backups and recovery processes.

            "Disaster Recovery Planning",
            "High-Availability Management",
            "RAC, ASM, CRS Cluster",
            "Data Guard",
